arrow-11.0.27-09-2020:
- Fingerprint success vibration is disabled with global haptic toggle.
- Added double tap status bar to sleep.
- Added double tap lockscreen to sleep.
- Disable screenshot sound.
- Added unlink notification and ringer volume toggle.
- Upstream changes and fixes.
arrow-11.0.12-10-2020:
- Merged Oct security patch.
- Added battery light customization
- Added notification light customization
- Moved Gestures and Buttons to Settings dashboard.
- Added Heads up tile and blacklist customization.
- Added advanced reboot and power menu customization.
- Added HwKeys customization.
- Added button brightness and backlight.
- Added accidental button touch prevention.
- Added proximity wake support.
- Make every menu in settings expanded by default.
- Added statusbar icons tuner.
- Added volte statusbar icon.
- Open advanced battery usage on header click.
- Added battery level animation.
- Show battery times in summary.
- Show link to open Google Play in installed apps section.
- Open app when clicking on icon in App Info
- Lockscreen charging info.
- Added dash charging support.
- Addressed many more NPE and misc issues.
- Added FOD support.
- Added Battery light feature.
- Screenshots include appname now.
- Misc changes and improvements not worth mentioning, please check our gerrit or github.
arrow-11.0.21-10-2020:
- Merged AOSP r8 tag
- ThemePicker improvements from AOSP
- Add Soft reboot option
- add an option to hide gestures pill
- Allow customizing the length of gesture navbar
- Add toggle to enable Lockscreen media
- Dark theme mode/ ColorBucket improvements
- Make Battery settings/Power Usage more appealing
- Enable feature flags for all build variants
- UX and UI improvements 
- Add Dark theme support in AOSP apps like Dialer, messages, and contacts
- Add Call recording feature in AOSP Dialer
- Improvement and fixes to AOSP DeskClock
- Improvements and basic features in Dialer, Keyboard, etc
- Remove Black QS statusbar background
- Show current and new version on APK installation
- New Icons in ThemePicker
- Misc changes and improvements not worth mentioning, please check our Gerrit or Github.
